    • Method Detail

      • runFunction

        public static java.lang.Double[] runFunction(Genome genome,
                                             java.lang.Double[] inputs,
                                             int depth)
        Runs the function implemented by the supplied Genome. This method assumes that the Genome has all its inputs in consecutive node positions starting from node 1.
        Parameters:
        genome - The Genome to run.
        inputs - An array of input values to pass to the Genome when running it. the number of inputs must match what is expected by the Genome or this method will throw an exception.
        depth - The number of iterations to run the Genome for before reading off a result.
        Returns:
        An array of output values produced by running the Genome. The number of outputs is determined by the number of output nodes in the Genome.

      • testFitness

        public static double testFitness(Genome genome,
                                 DataSet dataset,
                                 int depth)
        Tests the fitness of a Genome for computing a function represented by the supplied DataSet. The entries in the DataSet must align with what is expected by the Genome, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        genome - The Genome to test.
        dataset - The DataSet to test against.
        depth - The number of iterations to run the Genome for before reading off a result each time.
        Returns:
        A fitness score out of 100, with 100 being a Genome that perfectly reproduces the DataSet, and 0 being a Genome that gets every result completely wrong.

      • runSimulation

        public static Genome runSimulation(DataSet dataset,
                                   Configuration config,
                                   boolean visualize)
        Runs the complete NEAT algorithm to produce a Genome that implements the supplied DataSet as well as possible.
        Parameters:
        dataset - The DataSet to run the algorithm on.
        config - A Configuration object that provides the parameters to run the algorithm with.
        visualize - If true, the simulation will run in visualize mode, where it is artificially slowed down and rendered interactively in a window. If false, the algorithm runs at normal speed and the only feedback will be via stdout.
        Returns:
        The resulting Genome that best implements the DataSet.

      • viewGenome

        public static void viewGenome(Genome genome,
                              Configuration config)
        Displays a single Genome in a window.
        Parameters:
        genome - The Genome to render.
        config - A Configuration containing the parameters to use for the display.
